00037 #include "gevd_param_mixin.h"
00038 
00039 //------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //: Check if parameters are valid.  The default does nothing.
00041 bool  gevd_param_mixin::SanityCheck() { return true; }
00042 
00043 //------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //: Set the error message for this parameter block.
00045 //  If the message is not empty, this sets the valid flag to be false.
00046 //  An empty message resets the valid flag to be true.
00047 void gevd_param_mixin::SetErrorMsg(const char* msg)
00048 {
00049   if (msg && msg[0])
00050   {
00051     error_msg_ = msg;
00052     valid_ = false;
00053   }
00054   else
00055   {
00056     error_msg_ = "";
00057     valid_ = true;
00058   }
00059 }
